Review: It's a tall and shortin leangth limousine from benz.A party Benz Good for commuting for busy boss who will get time to get all spending works done and way back can fit in a party wear can see the up and down graph of business trends sip some water or cranberry juice in a wine glass. if your chauffer is good believe me it will not fall down..ambient light with contrast adjustment and all vanity fea tures makes it a class apart.Brutully modified you can carry spare cycles on it and ride your bicycle behind it in spare time.Thanks.
